entry.title: One of the best photo editing application
entry.content: Excellent editing tools and filters. Sharpening tool is very effective, doesn’t kill the photo quality.

One of the best photo editing application

Excellent editing tools and filters.
Sharpening tool is very effective, doesn’t kill the photo quality.

entry.title: Very poor functionality
entry.content: I tried to add an arrow pointing to an object but no where could i find this tool. Adding a line or a symbol is life essential.

Very poor functionality

I tried to add an arrow pointing to an object but no where could i find this tool. Adding a line or a symbol is life essential.

entry.title: Easy to use
entry.content: Got tired of Picasa constantly wanting to catalogue my photos everytime I used it to quickly edit a photo for facebook or kijiji. Decided to give this Fotor a try and I’m so happy I did. Very simple to use and the preset filters do exactly what I need them to do. So happy I made the switch!

Easy to use

Got tired of Picasa constantly wanting to catalogue my photos everytime I used it to quickly edit a photo for facebook or kijiji. Decided to give this Fotor a try and I’m so happy I did. Very simple to use and the preset filters do exactly what I need them to do. So happy I made the switch!

entry.title: Awesome
entry.content: This Is a great program, I really enjoy using it.

Awesome

This Is a great program, I really enjoy using it.

entry.title: Won’t save — just crashes!
entry.content: Ever since the last update, it’s impossible to save any work… instead, the app just CRASHES. I used to like Fotor, but now you’ve made it impossible to like or even to use.

Won’t save — just crashes!

Ever since the last update, it’s impossible to save any work… instead, the app just CRASHES. I used to like Fotor, but now you’ve made it impossible to like or even to use.

entry.title: *** Latest FOTOR bug ***
entry.content: Latest version of Fotor does not save edited pictures to computer.

entry.title: Good app for $0
entry.content: This app is perfect for the person who does basic photo editing. It does try to pressure you to buy the premium version. Overall good app.

Good app for $0

This app is perfect for the person who does basic photo editing. It does try to pressure you to buy the premium version. Overall good app.

entry.title: Pictures wont save.
entry.content: Ever since the program updated, I have been unable to save my photos. I’ve tried different sized files thinking that size might be a factor but its not. nothing will save.

Pictures wont save.

Ever since the program updated, I have been unable to save my photos. I’ve tried different sized files thinking that size might be a factor but its not. nothing will save.

entry.title: So much promise … but ...
entry.content:
For image editing and enhancements (I haven't used the collage functionality yet):
It has some really great functions to improve the look of photos. But using it is quite difficult. Eg. the sliders dont’ have an undo. So to compare different settings (eg Exposure), you have to manually drag the slider back to 0 or some other number to see the look. This really makes my workflow difficult. In fact, there’s no Undo for anything!
It also saves as a very small size JPEG and doesn't give you any options about size/quality. Major problem.
Some buttons are mysterious. Eg the compare button. What does it do???
So much potential for this app. But it needs improved ease of use.

So much promise … but ...

For image editing and enhancements (I haven't used the collage functionality yet):

It has some really great functions to improve the look of photos. But using it is quite difficult. Eg. the sliders dont’ have an undo. So to compare different settings (eg Exposure), you have to manually drag the slider back to 0 or some other number to see the look. This really makes my workflow difficult. In fact, there’s no Undo for anything!

It also saves as a very small size JPEG and doesn't give you any options about size/quality. Major problem.

Some buttons are mysterious. Eg the compare button. What does it do???

So much potential for this app. But it needs improved ease of use.

entry.title: OLDER VERSION WAS GREAT THIS ONE …CRASHING -OSX10.7.5
entry.content: The older version worked great and was easy to use, I recommended it many times. This new version is unstable and crashes what ever they did to "update and make it better" needs to be looked at and redone I believe as the crash report indicates clearly that it won't work on OSX Lion 10.7.5 as the last one did although it says that it will work. To the Fotor team I know you can do better please do and I will be recommending this once again.

OLDER VERSION WAS GREAT THIS ONE …CRASHING -OSX10.7.5

The older version worked great and was easy to use, I recommended it many times. This new version is unstable and crashes what ever they did to "update and make it better" needs to be looked at and redone I believe as the crash report indicates clearly that it won't work on OSX Lion 10.7.5 as the last one did although it says that it will work. To the Fotor team I know you can do better please do and I will be recommending this once again.

entry.title: A definite step backwards
entry.content:
I have been using Fotor professionaly for a few years because its filters were THAT good. But version 3 eliminated many, including their best filters—a case of fixing what isn’t broken.
Fotor is now in the dustbin.

A definite step backwards

I have been using Fotor professionaly for a few years because its filters were THAT good. But version 3 eliminated many, including their best filters—a case of fixing what isn’t broken.

Fotor is now in the dustbin.

entry.title: Totally Awesome!!
entry.content: I really like this app! It is great for someone like me who is not a professional with photo editing to be able to make my pictures look really nice! I can’t believe it’s free because I would gladly pay for this.

Totally Awesome!!

I really like this app!
It is great for someone like me who is not a professional with photo editing to be able to make my pictures look really nice!
I can’t believe it’s free because I would gladly pay for this.

entry.title: Good and Simple
entry.content: Exellent FREE App! This program offers some of the tools for editing photos. It is a good program for people who are beginners because acts as a stepping stone for those who wish to learn or make simple changes to photos.

entry.title: Easy to use
entry.content: Fotor is so easy to use for anyone that’s not a expert on image manipulation. The fact that it’s free blows my mind. I would gladly pay for this app because it is one of the best out there.

Easy to use

Fotor is so easy to use for anyone that’s not a expert on image manipulation.
The fact that it’s free blows my mind.
I would gladly pay for this app because it is one of the best out there.

entry.title: Fabulous Fotor!
entry.content: I LOVE this app!! I use photo edit and collage every day for my blog photos. So easy to use all the features. Adding text is a snap, and when I can't decide which photo to post -- the collage feature makes it easy to use them all. If there was a paid version that did even more I would buy it without hesitation. :)

Fabulous Fotor!

I LOVE this app!! I use photo edit and collage every day for my blog photos. So easy to use all the features. Adding text is a snap, and when I can't decide which photo to post -- the collage feature makes it easy to use them all. If there was a paid version that did even more I would buy it without hesitation. :)

entry.title: Holy... Update!
entry.content:
This was very needed and was amazingly well done! It seems as if this is a brand new app even though I’ve been using it for months :)
Great update and app, would recommend this to any photo-editing enthusiasts :)

entry.title: An Excellent Basic Editor
entry.content: This app is very simple, resize images, crop, basic colour fixes, text and premade effects. It’s no photoshop or anything, but its got the basics so your profile picture is super over exposed anymore. Or maybe you want all your instagram effects on your computer, they’re very similar.

An Excellent Basic Editor

This app is very simple, resize images, crop, basic colour fixes, text and premade effects. It’s no photoshop or anything, but its got the basics so your profile picture is super over exposed anymore. Or maybe you want all your instagram effects on your computer, they’re very similar.

entry.title: Great app
entry.content: Easy to use, really handy. Great app.

Great app

Easy to use, really handy. Great app.

entry.title: Excellent!: Maybe some precise tools?
entry.content:
I really love this app; it’s the only one I’ve tried and ended up keeping since I’ve had my Mac. I DO enjoy the new update, with the new filters especially.
I gave this app a four star instead of a five because as awesome as it is, I think it can be even better!
- a use of either layers, or the ability to add textures would be wonderful - More precise editing tools! I’d love to use this to edit familly portraits in a pinch, but with all the little cousins running around it’d be wonderful to have somethg to edit out zits etc - I would love to be able to change the size of the tilt shift. If you can I have no idea how
I look forward to seeing more updates!

Excellent!: Maybe some precise tools?

I really love this app; it’s the only one I’ve tried and ended up keeping since I’ve had my Mac.
I DO enjoy the new update, with the new filters especially.

I gave this app a four star instead of a five because as awesome as it is, I think it can be even better!

- a use of either layers, or the ability to add textures would be wonderful
- More precise editing tools! I’d love to use this to edit familly portraits in a pinch, but with all the little cousins running around it’d be wonderful to have somethg to edit out zits etc
- I would love to be able to change the size of the tilt shift. If you can I have no idea how

I look forward to seeing more updates!

entry.title: Great Quick Editing
entry.content: I use this to edit almost all my blog photos. It allows me to quickly go in and adjust colour, contrast, clarity, tilt-shift and crop. You can also easily add simple effects and text. Great for quick edits.

Great Quick Editing

I use this to edit almost all my blog photos. It allows me to quickly go in and adjust colour, contrast, clarity, tilt-shift and crop. You can also easily add simple effects and text. Great for quick edits.

entry.title: AMAZING
entry.content: I love this app. It was super easy to figure out - has a lot of filters and is a great way to add text. Thank you!

AMAZING

I love this app. It was super easy to figure out - has a lot of filters and is a great way to add text. Thank you!

entry.title: Great!
entry.content: Love it!! Easy to use and there’s a lot of possibilities!

Great!

Love it!! Easy to use and there’s a lot of possibilities!

entry.title: Easy and Convenient
entry.content: I always used to use online editing software to edit my pictures but Fotor is great! I don’t need an Internet connection and the features it provides are endless. I can add layers, add filters, adjust the picture and all. I have only saved my pictures to my computer folder, I have’t uploaded online so I cannot say anything about that, but I have not found any problems in saving the pictures as I do.

Easy and Convenient

I always used to use online editing software to edit my pictures but Fotor is great! I don’t need an Internet connection and the features it provides are endless. I can add layers, add filters, adjust the picture and all. I have only saved my pictures to my computer folder, I have’t uploaded online so I cannot say anything about that, but I have not found any problems in saving the pictures as I do.

entry.title: SCAM
entry.content: This app worked fine until I wanted to save and share it. Wouldn’t save and wouldn’t tell me why or what to fix so I had to share from the app. And then it wanted ALL my facebook information so that I could share the photo on Facebook. A photo editing app does NOT need your personal messages, friends lists, etc. SCAM

SCAM

Wouldn’t save and wouldn’t tell me why or what to fix so I had to share from the app. And then it wanted ALL my facebook information so that I could share the photo on Facebook. entry.title: Great app, old interface was easier to use.
entry.content: This is one of my favorite photo editing apps. It delivers great results and is very intuitive, however the old interface seemed easier to use than v2.0 (not a fan of accordion navigation, but maybe I’m just averse to change). Also, I can’t remember, but didn’t the old version use the photo I was editing as the thumbnail for effects?

Great app, old interface was easier to use.

This is one of my favorite photo editing apps. It delivers great results and is very intuitive, however the old interface seemed easier to use than v2.0 (not a fan of accordion navigation, but maybe I’m just averse to change). Also, I can’t remember, but didn’t the old version use the photo I was editing as the thumbnail for effects?

entry.title: Great app
entry.content:
I’ve tried tons of different photograph editing apps, and Fotor is definitely my favourite.
I love the effects and my images always turn out amazing. It’s especially cool because you can set the amount you want, so it’s more subtle.

entry.title: Easy to use effects

entry.title: great except when going to ‘save/export'
entry.content: This is a great easy to use app except in its current release it freezes when I go to ‘Save or Export’ my photo… when I hit ‘browse’ to show the app where I’d like to save the file, it freezes and the only way out is to Force Quit the app :(

entry.title: great collages!

This will be next project!.

entry.title: Processing works fine here
entry.content:
Perhaps @"Luster wand" below didn't think to make sure Fotor was set to export in Med or High quality, or perhaps the latest Fotor update addressed his issue.
Did his test on my system and photo shows no degradation from the original at all, looks gorgeous.

Processing works fine here

Perhaps @"Luster wand" below didn't think to make sure Fotor was set to export in Med or High quality, or perhaps the latest Fotor update addressed his issue.

Did his test on my system and photo shows no degradation from the original at all, looks gorgeous.
